title: What are the four majors of technology livelihood education? - Quora

response.answer_text: Due to prevailing corona pandemic conditions, one has no other go that to completely rely on Online modes for education, or for any other means of work. So, online medium has gained a lot of popularity. It is an undeniable fact. So the impacts of this can be both beneficiary as well as detrimental, depending on the individual. 1. Due to online mode of education , students’ approach would be narrow, they will be listening to lectures (theoretical knowledge) leaving practical sessions,which is paramount, at stake. In this way,they are deprived of the knowledge they could acquire in their educational institutions. 2. As they have to totally rely on soft copies provided, they would feel mentally exhausted and will be unable to do any additional work. 3.Being immersed in digital medium for disproportionate period of time will have long term effects ,which would get severe along time. Hopefully ,when we have an effective cure for this disease, which is not too far, we can get back to our pre-covid cherished life.
